home.title: Automobile Application
home.description: Your reliable partner in the world of cars.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of enthusiasts...
about.mission: We are a team of car enthusiasts striving to provide you with the best car buying experience. Our mission is to help everyone find the perfect vehicle for their needs and budget.
about.offer: Our dealership offers a wide range of new and used cars that undergo rigorous quality checks. We strictly cooperate with verified suppliers and manufacturers to ensure our customers get the best products on the market.
about.team: Our team consists of experienced professionals ready to answer all your questions, provide professional advice, and help with your choice. We value every client and strive to ensure a high level of service at all buying stages.
about.thanks: Thank you for choosing us! We hope you find your ideal car in our dealership. If you have questions, please

form.name: Name
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
